entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 80
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
MORE HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
